title: Rahu Transit in the 2nd House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Rahu transiting the 2nd house for Taurus Ascendant intensifies focus on wealth, speech, and personal values. This phase amplifies desire for financial growth, unconventional income sources, and material security. Sudden gains or fluctuations are possible, especially through non-traditional means. Speech becomes persuasive but requires caution to avoid manipulation or misunderstandings. Family dynamics may feel unsettled as priorities shift. When grounded in ethics and clarity, Rahu helps reshape value systems and expand earning potential through innovative strategies.

sections.heading: Spending & Possessions
points: Desire for luxury and status items

closing: Rahu in the 2nd house reshapes wealth and values through ambition and experimentation. Ethical grounding converts desire into sustainable financial growth.
